MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the CH43 postcode area of Prenton, affecting properties in Eversleigh Close and the surrounding area. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:15PM due to an underground cable fault. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 5:15PM. We will update this message if the situation changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:20PM on 14th October 2020
